price: -(ពួកគេ)ថ្លង់ គ និងងងឹត ហេតុដូចេ្នះពួកគេមិនអាចវិល ត្រឡប់(ទៅរកមាគ៌ាត្រឹមត្រូវ)វិញបានឡើយ។
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
